title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 825/98 of 20 April 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 2790/94 laying down common detailed rules for the implementation of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1601/92 concerning specific measures for the Canary Islands with regard to certain agricultural products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 825/98 of 20 April 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 2790/94 laying down common detailed rules for the implementation of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1601/92 concerning specific measures for the Canary Islands with regard to certain agricultural products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following products are hereby added to Annex II to Regulation (EC) No 2790/94 listing the maximum quantities of processed products which may be covered by traditional exports and consignments:
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 April 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(2) OJ L 320, 11. 12. 1996, p. 1.
(3) OJ L 296, 17. 11. 1994, p. 23.
(4) OJ L 304, 29. 11. 1994, p. 18.
